title: Mech vs Minions Help
body: Anyone know of any other way aside from email to contact Riot Merch support? I ordered Mechs vs Minions last week on Oct 13th, first shipment, and it still says pending on my account. I've attempted to email them multiple times but no response. Does anyone know if there is chat support or phone support for the merch site?

replies.body:
It can take up to a few *business days* for your order to process before it ships. Since you've already submitted a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), I recommend waiting for a billing specialist to get back to you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

The website said it would take 1-2 business days to ship the order, it's been 6 and the order hasn't shipped. I would have no problem with this if I had some communication from someone about the order. I emailed support on Tuesday of this week (3 business days after the order) and again on Thursday (5 business days after the order) and I have received no response at all.

We've had a lot of support tickets submitted recently, so response times will be a bit longer than normal. I'm confident our billing team will be with you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have additional questions.
